ygData.messageBody:
Here's a recipe list for wizards. http://www.calpoly.edu/~sdunn/wizards.htm This list is a SPOILER.

Dave Steele wrote:

> From: "Dave Steele" <dsteele@...>
>
> I found a couple of web sites on the research topice that I wanted to share,
> These would be considered spoilers so beware.
>

> you get from combination of various pages, some lot of good stuff here if
> you are an enchanter
> http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest/
>

>
> Uuno Darkstaff
